short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 3read allows you to read selected text in 3 dimensions. It can aid in speed reading, if you like.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight a selection and press alt+r or a hotkey of your choice. Read the words as they fly past in 3d! You can pause and rewind a little for full comprehension. Change the speed as you read. Use full screen for full concentration. Fast to start and close. Requires no special permissions!
